courses.title: Beginner Guitar Course
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing, including chords, strumming, and beginner songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano techniques like arpeggios, scales, and improvisation.

courses.title: Flute for Beginners
courses.description: Start your flute journey with this beginner course covering notes, scales, and simple melodies.

courses.title: Intermediate Violin Skills
courses.description: Enhance your violin playing with intermediate level skills, including vibrato and shifting.

courses.title: Drums: Rhythm and Groove
courses.description: Learn the essential rhythm patterns and grooves for drumming in various styles.

courses.title: Jazz Guitar Improvisation
courses.description: Learn to improvise jazz solos and master the art of creative expression on the guitar.

courses.title: Music Theory for Beginners
courses.description: Understand the basics of music theory including notes, scales, and chords for any instrument.

courses.title: Songwriting Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of writing your own songs, including structure, melody, and lyrics.
